wikipedia_page.main: Arthur William Green (27 July 1904 – 19 August 1981) was a British sprinter. He competed in the men's 400 metres at the 1928 Summer Olympics.

response: Bill or Billy Green may refer to:
*Billy Green (Australian footballer) (1910–1978), Australian rules footballer for St Kilda
